description: Example GPT-4o-mini responses for sentiment analysis

clear_positive.input: Amazing book! Highly recommend it to everyone. One of the best books I've ever read.

clear_negative.input: Disappointing read. Did not enjoy it at all. Would not recommend.

clear_neutral.input: Decent book. Has its moments but nothing special. Average overall.

mixed_leaning_positive.input: The book has some flaws, but overall the story is compelling and the characters are well-developed. I enjoyed it despite the slow pacing.

mixed_leaning_negative.input: While the premise was interesting, the execution fell flat. A few good moments don't make up for the overall disappointing experience.

academic_neutral.input: This book provides a comprehensive overview of the topic. The author presents multiple perspectives without taking a strong stance. Suitable for academic purposes.

enthusiastic_positive.input: OMG! This is the BEST book ever!!! I couldn't put it down! 10/10 would recommend! üî•üî•üî•

subtle_negative.input: The book is... fine, I guess. If you have nothing else to read, maybe give it a try. Don't expect too much though.

technical_neutral.input: The book covers topics A, B, and C. It includes 300 pages of content organized into 15 chapters. Published in 2023.

sarcastic_negative.input: Oh sure, this is a 'masterpiece' if you enjoy wasting your time on poorly written characters and predictable plots.
